channel.title: SkyLearn Pre-Filter Test Feed – Single Article
channel.description: Individual article feed for testing relevance filters and Zapier integration.

item.title: EY relocates UK headquarters to sustainable London Bridge campus
item.description: Ernst & Young has moved 5,000 staff to a new 350,000 sq ft office complex featuring green roofs and smart energy systems.

item.title: HSBC moves wealth management division to new Canary Wharf HQ
item.description: The bank has completed its relocation to a 220,000 sq ft sustainable office at 25 North Colonnade, consolidating multiple London sites.

item.title: Coldplay announces charity concert series for 2026
item.description: The band will perform across Europe to raise funds for environmental projects.

item.title: British Land secures new tenant for Regent’s Place offices
item.description: A global tech company has leased 60,000 sq ft at British Land’s Regent’s Place campus in London’s West End.
